_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The characteristics of a person covered: Impressive when going out and coming back
Impressive when looking ahead and aside
Impressive when bending and extending the limbs
Impressive when bearing the outer robe, bowl, and robes
Don't truly understand: 'This is suffering' ... 'This is the origin of suffering' ... 'This is the cessation of suffering'
